original_text: that the daughters of Israel went year by year to lament the daughter of Jephthah the Gileadite four days in the year.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 딸들이 해마다 가서 길르앗 사람 입다의 딸을 위하여 나흘씩 애곡하더라

sentences.original_text: that the daughters of Israel went year by year
to lament the daughter of Jephthah the Gileadite
sentences.korean_translation: 길르앗 사람 입다의 딸을 애도하기 위해
